org.restlet.component
Interface RestletContainer

All Superinterfaces:
Component, Element, Maplet, OriginServer, Restlet, UniformInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultRestletContainer
public interface RestletContainer
extends OriginServer, Maplet

Origin server that contains restlets or maplets. Note that a container is a maplet itself. Restlet container can optionnaly be contained within a Restlet server.
